articles.description: The deadly viral disease Ebola has once again surfaced in Africa, and health officials are rushing out vaccines and other measures to stop its spread. As of Tuesday, there have been at least 11 cases and seven deaths in two countries, including Guinea, which …

articles.title: How to properly wear two masks—and other mask-fitting tips following recent CDC advice - Medical Xpress
articles.description: New mask advice from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention—connected with a new study—focuses on making sure masks fit correctly to better prevent the spread of COVID-19.

articles.title: Genetic study of Lewy body dementia supports ties to Alzheimer's and Parkinson's diseases - National Institutes of Health
articles.description: NIH-led study locates five genes that may play a critical role in Lewy body dementia.
